Steven Ellison (amụrụ n'October 7, 1983), nke a maara site na aha egwu ya Flying Lotus ma ọ bụ mgbè ụfọdụ FlyLo, bụ onye America na-emepụta ihe ndekọ, DJ na ónyé na-eti egwu si Los Angeles
Ọ bụkwa onye guzobere akara ndekọ Brainfeeder.

Flying Lotus ewepụtala abọm studio asaá 1983 (2006), Los Angeles (2008), Cosmogramma (2010), Until the Quiet Comes (2012), You're Dead! (2014), Flamagra (2019) na Yasuke (2021) -nke a na-aja mma. O mepụtara ọtụtụ n'ime egwu egwu na Cartoon Network's Adult Swim programming block. O nyekwara áká remixes màkà ndị na-ese ihe Plug Research gụnyere Mia Doi Todd.
N'afọ 2012, Flying Lotus malitere ịpị rap n'okpuru onye Captain Murphy, dabere na Sealab 2021 nkè otu aha ahụ
Ellison zoro eziokwu a ruo ọtụtụ ọnwa, n'ikpeazụ kpughere njirimara ya ọtụtụ izu mgbè a tọhapụrụ mixtape rap mbụ ya: Duality (2012).
A mụrụ Flying Lotus Steven Ellison na October 7, 1983, na Los Angeles, California

Ọ bụ nwa nwa nke ónyé na-eme piano jazz Alice Coltrane, onye di ya bụ onye na-egwu saxophon John Coltrane. Tụkwasị na nke a, ọ bụ nwa nwa nke onye na-agụ egwú na ónyé na-ede egwú Marilyn McLeod, ónyé a ma ama maka ide Diana Ross's "Love Hangover" na Freda Payne's "I Get High (On Your Memory) " ma bụrụ nwanne nwanyị Alice Coltrane. Otu onye édémédé akpọwo nwanne nne ya Alice "mmetụta kachasị na egwu Ellison". Nnyocha DNA kpughere na Ellison bụ nwa ndị Tikar nke Cameroon.
